      • persist

        protected boolean persist(java.lang.String data,
                          java.lang.Boolean highPriority)
        Saves a string to disk.
        Parameters:
        data - the string to save
        highPriority - the priority we want to use for persisting the data
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, false otherwise

        Returns:
